column2: Wrap Technologies, Inc operates as a development stage security technology company. The company is headquartered in Tempe, Arizona and currently employs 13 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in providing solutions to customers, primarily law enforcement and security personnel. Its product includes the BolaWrap 100. The BolaWrap 100 is a hand-held remote restraint device that discharges an eight-foot bola style Kevlar tether to entangle an individual at a range of 10-25 feet. BolaWrap 100 assists law enforcement to safely and effectively control encounters. BolaWrap 100 enables law enforcement to remotely and temporarily control an individual or impede flight by targeting and wrapping an individual’s legs. BolaWrap 100 contains a receptacle for the bola cartridge along with the activation, deployment and safety mechanisms. Bola cartridges are quickly ejected allowing rapid reloading, activation and deployment. As of April 17, 2017, the Company’s product was in the development stage and it had no operations.
